fields.title: Pancakes
fields.instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In another bowl, beat the eggs, then add milk and melted butter. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until combined. Heat a pan over medium heat and cook pancakes until golden on each side. Serve with syrup and butter.

fields.title: Omelette
fields.instructions: Beat the eggs, add salt, and pour into a hot pan. Cook until set and serve with toast.

fields.title: French Toast
fields.instructions: Dip bread slices in a mixture of beaten eggs and milk, then fry until golden brown. Serve with syrup.

fields.title: Scrambled Eggs
fields.instructions: Beat eggs and cook them in a pan, stirring constantly until fully cooked. Season with salt and pepper.

fields.title: Breakfast Burrito
fields.instructions: Fill a tortilla with scrambled eggs, cheese, and salsa. Roll up and serve.

fields.title: Bagel with Cream Cheese
fields.instructions: Toast a bagel and spread cream cheese on it. Serve with your favorite toppings.

fields.title: Smoothie Bowl
fields.instructions: Blend frozen fruit with yogurt and milk. Pour into a bowl and top with granola and fresh fruit.

fields.title: Avocado Toast
fields.instructions: Toast bread and spread mashed avocado on top. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and chili flakes.

fields.title: Waffles
fields.instructions: Mix waffle batter and cook in a preheated waffle iron until golden brown. Serve with syrup.

fields.title: Breakfast Sandwich
fields.instructions: Assemble a sandwich with eggs, cheese, and ham between two slices of toast or an English muffin.

fields.title: Granola Parfait
fields.instructions: Layer granola, yogurt, and fresh fruit in a glass. Repeat layers and serve immediately.

fields.title: Blueberry Muffins
fields.instructions: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C). In a large bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In another bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, and melted butter. Combine the wet and dry ingredients, then fold in the blueberries. Pour the batter into a muffin tin and bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.
